original_title: Shark: Mind of a Demon with Fabien Cousteau
overview: Shark: Mind of a Demon With Fabien Cousteau is a 2006 documentary/reality television special. The film was the result of an attempt by Fabien Cousteau to study the great white shark in its natural surroundings using a submarine shaped like a shark called Troy.
title: Shark: Mind of a Demon with Fabien Cousteau
